tech_stack.i18n: Next.js built-in i18n routing (vi default, en secondary)

routes.role: Home page; reads content by locale vi/en
API route for form submission (email/CRM hook)

font_family.heading: "Inter Tight", system-ui, -apple-system, Segoe UI, Roboto, Arial, "Noto Sans", "Liberation Sans", sans-serif
font_family.body: Inter, system-ui, -apple-system, Segoe UI, Roboto, Arial, "Noto Sans", "Liberation Sans", sans-serif

components.name: Navbar
components.role: Top navigation with locale switcher; sticky, translucent on scroll

components.name: Hero
components.role: Page hero with headline, subheadline, CTA and subtle motion

components.name: ServiceCard
components.role: Compact card with icon, title, bullets, link

components.name: CaseStudy
components.role: Case study highlight with KPI badges

components.name: ContactForm
components.role: Form with validation, spam honeypot, and success/error states

components.name: Footer
components.role: Global footer with contacts, social, legal, and language

goldenenergy_strategy.recommendation: Start with path-based for SEO consolidation and simpler ops; reserve subdomain for future scaling as distinct brand.

rendering.contact: SSR (for CSRF token) or static with client action; cache-control private

seo.metadata: Use marketing-content.json; set title/description per locale; OpenGraph/Twitter; canonical per locale
seo.images: Next/Image with AVIF/WebP; provide og:image per page

a11y_rules: Keyboard navigable components with focus states
ARIA labels for icons and interactive elements
Semantic HTML structure with landmarks (header, main, footer)
Form inputs with labels, descriptions, and error messaging
